text: Khaing Thu Kha (; , also spelled as Khine Thu Kha; born 1970) is an Arakanese politician who is the spokesperson and the news and information officer of the Arakan Army (AA), an armed group advocating for the autonomy and self- determination of the Rakhine people in Myanmar.ပြန်ကြားရေးတာဝန်ခံ ဦးခိုင်သုခ (U Khaing Thukha, in charge of information)
title: Khine Thu Kha
